original_text: He makes tired people strong again. When people have become weak, he gives them more strength. He makes tired people strong again. When people have become weak, he gives them more strength. He makes tired people strong again. When people have become weak, he gives them more strength. He makes tired people strong again. When people have become weak, he gives them more strength. He makes tired people strong again.
korean_text: 피곤한 자에게는 능력을 주시며 무능한 자에게는 힘을 더하시나니

sentences.original_text: He makes tired people strong again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 지친 사람들을 다시 강하게 만드십니다.
그는 그들에게 더 많은 힘을 주십니다.
